ygData.subject: RE: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey what a great idea!  How about: Name:		Blind Affinity Level: 	39 Instrument: Wind Effect:	AoE Stun for 2 pulses Message:	 XXX is blinded! 		(In hardest to
ygData.messageBody:
Hey what a great idea! How about:

Name: Blind Affinity
Level: 39
Instrument: Wind
Effect: AoE Stun for 2 pulses
Message: "XXX is blinded!" (In hardest to see colour of
course)
Resist Msg: "XXX resists your attempt at Blind Affinity"

I'd love to run around failing to "Blind" people. Imagine how long
it would take some of those hard-headed newbies that are always asking ME to
bind them to see the "l" in there.

Kit

> My suggestion for songs would be:
>
> Level 39: Invis to Undead (useful in Lower guk etc)
> Level 45: An upgraded Bellow/DD song (giving us better combat skills)
> Level 47: Summon Corpse song (like the necro one)
> Level 49: Upgraded older song (such as charm) or a combo song (2 effects
> such as hymm and clarity)

>Shouldn't one of these songs be a Bind Affinity song? .............just
>kidding, couldn't resist.

>Wayne
